protein.specific_function: Plays a crucial role in B-cell ontogeny. Transiently phosphorylates GTF2I on tyrosine residues in response to B-cell receptor cross-linking. Required for the formation of functional ARID3A DNA-binding complexes

go_class.description: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine kinase activity
